title: Drag and Drop Controls
description: Learn how to use drag-and-drop controls to move tasks around
subtasks: Drag and drop this task to the GO! column.
Drag and drop this task to the DONE column.

title: Creating Tasks
subtasks: Move this task to the GO! column.
Activate the task creation dialogue by clicking the plus button (+) inside the INBOX column.
Give the task a title.
Give the task a description.
Add a couple of subtasks to the task.
Click the CREATE button to activate the CREATE TASK dialogue.
Move this task to the DONE column.

title: Editing Tasks
subtasks: Move this task to the GO! column.
Activate the edit task dialogue by right-clicking the task you just created, and then clicking EDIT.
Edit the details of the task â€” edit its title and description. Add and remove subtasks from it.
Click the SUBMIT button.
Move this task to the DONE column.

title: Adding Members to Boards
description: Learn how to add a team member to a board. Team members cannot see the content of a board that they aren't added to!
subtasks: Move this task to the GO! column.
Activate the team controls menu by clicking TEAM from the control bar above.
Click on the demo member to add it to the currently displayed board.
That's it! Move this task to the DONE column.

title: Assigning Tasks to Members
description: Now that you added a member to this board, you can assign tasks to them! When assigned a task, a member can move that task across the board and check its subtasks "done".
subtasks: Move this task to the GO! column.
Right click on the task you created inside the INBOX column to activate its context menu.
From the context menu, hover on assign and click on the demo user.
That's it! Move this task to the DONE column.

title: (Optional) Member View
description: If you'd like, you can log out now and log in as the demo member to see how member access looks like. Use the demo member's username, and the password "securepassword".
subtasks: Move this task to the GO! column.
Log out and log back in as a team member.
As a team member, move the task you created as admin from the INBOX column to the done column.
Try to move other tasks. (Spoiler: You can't!)
Log out and log back in as yourself.
Move this task to the DONE column.

title: (Optional) Member View
description: If you'd like, you can log out now and log in as the demo member to see how member access looks like. Use the demo member's username, and the password "securepassword".
subtasks: Move this task to the GO! column.
Log out and log back in as a team member.
As a team member, move the task you created as admin from the INBOX column to the done column.
Try to move other tasks. (Spoiler: You can't!)
Log out and log back in as yourself.
Move this task to the DONE column.

title: Inviting Members
description: Learn how to invite members to your team.
subtasks: Move this task to the GO! column.
Activate the team controls menu by clicking TEAM from the control bar above.
Click on the plus (+) button at the bottom of the members list.
Hover your mouse on the question mark (?), and read the popover.
Click OK.
Move this task to the DONE column.

title: Creating Boards
description: Learn how to create new boards.
subtasks: Move this task to the GO! column.
Activate the boards controls menu by clicking BOARDS from the control bar above.
Click on the plus (+) button at the bottom of the boards list.
Enter a name for the new board.
Click CREATE.
Move this task to the DONE column.

title: Editing Boards
subtasks: Move this task to the GO! column.
Activate the boards controls menu by clicking BOARDS from the control bar above.
Right click on the board you just created.
Click EDIT from the context menu activate the EDIT BOARD dialogue.
Enter a new name for the board.
Click SUBMIT.
Move this task to the DONE column.

title: Deleting Tasks
description: Learn how to delete tasks to de-clutter your boards.
subtasks: Move this task to the GO! column.
Right click on the task you created to activate its context menu.
Click DELETE from the context menu activate the DELETE TASK dialogue.
Click DELETE.
Move this task to the DONE column.

title: Deleting Boards
subtasks: Move this task to the GO! column.
Right click on the board you previously created to activate its context menu.
Click DELETE to activate the DELETE BOARD dialogue.
Click DELETE.
Move this task to the DONE column.

title: Deleting Members
description: Learn how to delete members. In GoTeam! all members are tied to a single team. Deleting a member will delete their account!
subtasks: Move this task to the GO! column.
Activate the team controls menu by clicking TEAM from the control bar above.
Right click on the demo member to activate the member context menu.
Click DELETE from the context menu activate the DELETE MEMBER dialogue.
Click DELETE.
Move this task to the DONE column.

title: Congrats!
description: You are now a well-deserved GoTeam! admin. You can either delete all tutorial tasks, or simply create a new board, switch to it, and delete this one. Whenever you need, click on the HELP button from the control bar for reminders on GoTeam! controls.
